item.title: STAT software - the student's guide
item.description: Learning statistics using technology - useful tools and services for students and teachers Popular and powerfull statistical software useful for learning or teaching statistics The R Project for Statistical Computing: https://www.

item.title: Dydaktyka
item.description: Rok 2020/2021 (zima) 1. Metodologia badań stosunków międzynarodowych (C) Opis zajęć (LINK) Notatki do ćwiczeń (w przygotowaniu) Link do folderu z lekturami: LINK Literatura podstawowa: Babbie, E.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: About
item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of International and Political Studies at the University of Lodz (Wydział Studiów Międzynarodowych i Politologicznych | Uniwersytet Łódzki).

item.title: Research
item.description: My research focuses on voting systems and electoral behavior. I also have an interest in research methodology.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This year I teach the following courses: 2020/2021 (Fall) Statistics & Demography (L + E) Syllabus (USOS) My slides for lectures and exercise classes (forthcoming) 2020/2021 (Spring) Introduction to electoral systems

item.title: Kontakt | Contact
item.description: Email <- str_c( "michal.pierzgalski", "@", "uni.lodz.pl" ) Department of International and Political Studies

item.title: Learning statistics - a few useful R commands
item.description: Some useful R commands for students learning fundamentals of statistics 1.
